forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind around 14 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening deepens over Downtown San Francisco, the skyline wears a quilt of soft clouds twisting and turning under the gentle embrace of the west-southwest breeze. The temperature rests comfortably around 54, inviting residents to snuggle into light layers. The wind whistles playfully, a reminder of the city’s trademark charm, as it brushes its fingers through the streets, creating an atmosphere both cozy and invigorating.

Tomorrow dawns with promise, shedding clouds for the warmth of sunshine that will grace the city. A high near 64 will emerge, with a playful drop in temperature as afternoon rolls in, harmonized by gusts that might surprise with a lift. The air carries the lingering essence of marine fog, a reminder of the Pacific’s touch, yet much of the day will reveal clarity, urging outings along picturesque paths. For a venture into the park or a stroll down Market Street, mid-weight attire would suit finely—a light jacket perhaps, paired with comfortable shoes, capturing the relaxing spirit of a day spent mingling amongst friendly faces. As the clock ticks into the evening, the coolness may beckon a cozy spot at a local café, nurturing both heart and soul with warmth.
